abstract.para: This chapter covers additional support for Solr operations (such as faceting) that cannot be directly accessed via the repository interface. It's recommended to add those operations as custom implementation as described in .

section.title: Faceting
section.para: Faceting cannot be directly applied using the SolrRepository but the SolrTemplate holds support for this feature.

section.title: Filter Query
section.para: Filter Queries improve query speed. It is recommended to implement geospatial search as filter query.
